sentence.Network_en: The sedimentary members are largely turbidites of greywacke facies.
sentence.Network_cn: 沉积岩的组成大部分为杂砂岩相的浊积岩.

sentence.Network_en: Sedimentary loading with consequent thermal blanketing will become major factors.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着热熄灭作用以后,沉积载荷将变成主要因素.

sentence.Network_en: Loose sediments may be changed into solid sedimentary rocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 松散的沉积物可以变成坚硬的沉积岩.

entry.def: Sedimentary rocks are formed from sediment left by water, ice, or wind.
